title: Test
summary: This grouped bar chart has 3 categories of Half on the x axis representing 6 groups: Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS.
Averaging these 6 groups, the highest category is found for Half 1st half 2019 with a mean value of 1841.67.
Followed by 1st half 2018 with a mean value of 1738.5.
The lowest category is observed at 1st half 2017 that has a mean value of 1681.67
showing a difference of 9.1% with the maximum value.

In case of 1st half 2019, Asia-Pacific shows more dominance than any other Half with a value 4011.0 and it has the lowest value 3240.0 in 1st half 2017.  However, Europe is the second impactful group, and it has the highest value 2370.0 for Half 1st half 2019 and the lowest 2001.0 in case of 1st half 2017.
